articles.title: Harrowing details emerge after surfer killed by shark off popular beach in Australia: "Really dramatic" - CBS News
articles.description: The surfer, who had a wife and young daughter, lost "a number of limbs" and his surfboard was broken in two, police said.
articles.content: Australian biologists said Sunday a great white shark measuring up to 12 feet likely killed a 57-year-old surfer off Sydney this weekend, as harrowing details of the attack emerged and authorities st… [+3544 chars]
